translation: He who thus knows the Spirit and Matter together with their qualities, in whatever condition he may be, he is not reborn.
commentary: 13.24 who who? Evam thus? Vetti knows? Purusha Purusha? Prakritim Prakriti? f and? qualities alities? with with? Absolutely in all ways? Present: living? Even also? Not not? He he? Bhuyah again? Abhijayate is born.Commentary One who knows the Soul and Nature with its alities? whatever his conduct may be? frees himself from the cycle of births and deaths. Such is the advantage he gains from discriminative knowledge
